Package serverModel

Class StudentList

java.lang.Object
serverModel.StudentList
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDBCredentials
public class StudentList
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDBCredentials
Retrieves data from the data base and puts it into an ArrayList as Student information.
Since:
April 18, 2020
Version:
1.8
Author:
Desiree Leal, Hoang Truong, Rohit Yeast
